name: Rhythm Any Music
description:
Play using your own music and get into the rhythm with amazing backgrounds that are automatically generated by your music. Experience the beat of the game using your keyboard or any USB-based plug and play controller.

Find your rhythm!

Bring your music to life with Rhythm Any Music! Turn your favorites songs into a rad and relaxing experience. Whether you play classical or hip hop, all will be automatically generated by your choice of music.

Features:

- Score points with every hit, by tapping to the rhythm of music!


- Import your music file, create notes automatically!

- Use the Music Power to triple your scores.

- An exciting environment generated from your music.

- Play using your keyboard or any USB-based plug and play controller.
